game.name: Legitimate Space Corp Simulator LLC
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: NOW HIRING: Station Manager! Run a totally-legit* space biz in Sector 7-G. Farm alien crops, refuel shady ships, and sell dangerously edible snacks. Perks: gloves, oxygen insurance**, and mild relevance. No exp needed. Apply today! *Legit status not valid in all sectors. **Terms apply.
